author: Bloomberg News
title: Federal Reserve went into crisis-fighting mode with ‘forceful’ policy response, minutes show
description: At the unscheduled meeting, officials announced they would cut their benchmark interest rate to nearly zero and relaunch massive bond-buying programs
content:
Federal Reserve officials went into crisis-fighting mode as they grasped the scale of the harm the coronavirus pandemic would likely do the U.S. economy.
Policy makers saw risks pointing to the downside and warranting a “forceful” response, according to a re… [+2214 chars]
